scripts.help: echo "=> Install NVM for avoid version inconsitencies, current version $(node --version)"
scripts.clean: lerna clean --yes && find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'dist' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.bootstrap: npm run help && npm run clean && npm i && lerna bootstrap
